item.title: Is minecraft fun?
item.dc:creator: @_SITTION |SITTION|
item.description:
@_SITTION wrote:

[quote=“cane, post:6, topic:376085”]You have to collect your own resources. Like you can mine stone and then use the amount of stone you mine to create a house. Or you can dig into a rock face if you are a bit scarce on time. The more you play the more you enjoy

Check out some videos of seananners
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ANgI2o_Jinc&feature=channel - Episode 1
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jxz04gqxH1M - Episode 2
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m5nACDKCgcw - Episode 3

is the game like…Going to a menu Clickin on a house and u Place it somewhere to hide for the Monsters at night?? or is it like u need to click Ea rock after rock untill u got a big house??[/quote]

Okay ima check it out

OF: aww,., i downloaded the game installed and tryed to run. it sad bad Drvier it says i need to update some shit… well i has a laptop So i gonna download it on there :d

THX guys

item.title: Is minecraft fun?
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

You have to collect your own resources. Like you can mine stone and then use the amount of stone you mine to create a house. Or you can dig into a rock face if you are a bit scarce on time. The more you play the more you enjoy

Check out some videos of seananners
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ANgI2o_Jinc&feature=channel - Episode 1
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jxz04gqxH1M - Episode 2
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m5nACDKCgcw - Episode 3

item.title: Is minecraft fun?
item.dc:creator: @_SITTION |SITTION|
item.description:
@_SITTION wrote:

cane:

At first I thought I would hate it but i decided to buy it cheap now and see what all the fuss is about. And i can say I love it!! There is nothing more rewarding then digging and digging and reaching a valuable resource, then crafting armour and fighting against the monsters. Im currently working on building a Boat house and a fence for the animals that roam around. All in all I have been playing it so much I am considering proposing to it.

is the game like…Going to a menu Clickin on a house and u Place it somewhere to hide for the Monsters at night?? or is it like u need to click Ea rock after rock untill u got a big house??

Read full topic
